mapper.select: update INSBAgreementarea set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},agreementid = #{agreementid},province = #{province},city = #{city} where id = #{id}

select DISTINCT (a.city), d.comcodename AS cityname, a.province, e.comcodename as provincename FROM insbagreementarea a, insbchannelagreement b, insbchannel c, insbregion d, insbregion e WHERE a.agreementid = b.id AND b.channelid = c.id AND b.deptid = c.deptid AND a.city = d.comcode AND a.province = e.comcode AND a.city IS NOT NULL AND ( c.deleteflag != 0 OR c.deleteflag IS NULL ) AND b.agreementstatus = '1' AND c.channelinnercode = #{channelinnercode}
and a.province = #{province}

select DISTINCT (a.city), d.comcodename AS cityname, a.province, e.comcodename as provincename, c.jobnum FROM insbagreementarea a, insbchannelagreement b, insbchannel c, insbregion d, insbregion e WHERE a.agreementid = b.id AND b.channelid = c.id AND b.deptid = c.deptid AND a.city = d.comcode AND a.province = e.comcode AND a.city IS NOT NULL and IFNULL(c.jobnum,'') != '' AND ( c.deleteflag != 0 OR c.deleteflag IS NULL ) AND b.agreementstatus = '1' AND c.channelinnercode = #{channelinnercode}
and a.province = #{province}
